name: Rockin Space T Defender
description:
Save The Day!

Shoot Those Dreaded invaders.
Shatter The Descending asteroids.

Various game options - Invader Levels, Invaders Runner, Asteroid Runner and All Levels Challenge
Capture collectables, collect coins and buy power ups - Nuke, FastShot, Multigun & Shield.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Web/PC Controls

Arrows or A,W,S,D to move
Space bar or left mouse to Fire
Holding Fire will trigger a slow auto shoot unless the Fast Shot Power Up is used
Power Ups can also be triggered

by clicking or using keys 1, 2, 3
(depending on the number of Power Ups selected)
